GlobalClusterArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the global cluster.

GlobalClusterResourceId.description: The AWS Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database cluster. This identifier is found in AWS CloudTrail log entries whenever the AWS KMS key for the DB cluster is accessed.

description: The AWS::DocDB::GlobalCluster resource represents an Amazon DocumentDB Global Cluster.

DeletionProtection.description: Indicates whether the global cluster has deletion protection enabled. The global cluster can't be deleted when deletion protection is enabled.

Engine.description: The database engine to use for this global cluster.

EngineVersion.description: The engine version to use for this global cluster.

GlobalClusterIdentifier.description: The cluster identifier of the global cluster.

SourceDBClusterIdentifier.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to use as the primary cluster of the global cluster. You may also choose to instead specify the DBClusterIdentifier. If you provide a value for this parameter, don't specify values for the following settings because Amazon DocumentDB uses the values from the specified source DB cluster: Engine, EngineVersion, StorageEncrypted

StorageEncrypted.description: Indicates whether the global cluster has storage encryption enabled.

Tags.description: The tags to be assigned to the Amazon DocumentDB resource.
